mdRecord.dcterms:title: Les considerations des quatre mondes, à sauoir est: diuin, angelique, celeste, & sensible: comprinses en quatre centuries de quatrains, contenans la cresme de diuine & humaine philosophie / Par Guillaume De La Perriere Tolosan
Considerations des qvatre mondes
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: La Perrière, Guillaume de, 1499-1565 [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:contributor: Douglas H. Gordon Collection of French Books (University of Virginia) [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Signatures: A-P⁸ (leaves P7 and P8 are blank) [original]
Text within ornamental borders, some with initials I.M. or I.P. [original]

SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Binder: Trautz-Bauzonnet. Bookplates of Robert Hoe and Lucius Wilmerding. Gordon Collection. Bookplate of Douglas Gordon. GOrdon list, 16. Last blank leaf wanting in this copy. [original]
